name: Cindy Brock and the Legend of the Keytar
name_original: Cindy Brock and the Legend of the Keytar
description:
Taking inspiration from the likes of Mega Man and Crypt of the NecroDancer, time your movements to the beat in this rhythm-based platformer!

Credits:

Andrew Forster - Producer

Justin Goode - Character Artist

Bryana Volke - Environment Artist

Jethro Schoppenhorst - Programmer

Ezekiel Pearson - Game Designer

Ian Jeannin - Level Designer

Carl J. Sorenson - Music and SFX

Alexa L. Borden - Music

Macy Camille - Music

Alex Riak - Music

Yigit K. Guc - Music

Dan Wessels - Music

Jonathan Gilmer - Music and 2D Art
